course_title: Adult Gerontological Primary Care Nurse Practitioner I
course_description: The first course in a three-course series focused on diagnosing and managing health problems of the acute and chronically ill adult patient using a systems and environmental approach. The role of the AGACNP as direct care provider and consultant in multiple care settings is discussed.
sections: Class Nbr: 3229, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-4:20p, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Open
